intro.en: Koh Samui's cooking classes offer an intimate island experience, often in beautiful tropical settings overlooking the sea. Classes here are smaller and more personal, with local families sharing their traditional recipes. While there are fewer options than in Chiang Mai or Bangkok, the quality is excellent and the setting is unbeatable.
intro.nl: De kooklessen op Koh Samui bieden een intieme eilandervaring, vaak in prachtige tropische omgevingen met uitzicht op zee. Lessen hier zijn kleiner en persoonlijker, met lokale families die hun traditionele recepten delen. Hoewel er minder opties zijn dan in Chiang Mai of Bangkok, is de kwaliteit uitstekend en de setting onverslaanbaar.

en: Book well in advance — Koh Samui has fewer classes that fill up quickly
Classes with local families offer the most authentic experience
The seaside masterclass option is unique to Koh Samui — highly recommended
Combine a cooking class with island exploring for a full day activity
Evening classes often include sunset views over the Gulf of Thailand
